name: Dragon Oasis
description:
Created for "Mini Jam 53: Oasis" in ~72 hours.

Fate is truly cruel. Survive the desert and return home.

Controls:

WASD / Arrows: Move
Z / Space: Jump, Bash
X: Skip Cutscene

---

Programming and Design by Billy Monks

Low Poly 3D Models by Quaternius
https://patreon.com/quaternius

by Armon Pakdel
